answerText: Faraday's law of induction[10] Faraday's law is the basis of these devices, which uses a pair of inductively coupled coils to move an electromotive force from one voltage to another.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 3 | 13 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The negative sign in this law is a result of Lenz's law. For 10 points each: [10] Name this law which states that the induced electromotive force in a loop of wire is equal to the time derivative of the magnetic flux through the loop. It is often written as one of Maxwell's equations.
